name: physicsbot
description: A Discord bot intended for usage with a physics discord server

scripts.start: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production CONFIG=config.json TOKEN=$(cat token) node lib/index.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development CONFIG=config.json TOKEN=$(cat token) node lib/index.js
scripts.test: TEST=true CONFIG=config.json TOKEN=$(cat token) nyc --reporter=text mocha --require @babel/register

author: ekzyis
